org.mellowtech.core.util

Class FileInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mellowtech.core.util.FileInfo
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class FileInfo
extends Object
    File icon and file info provider. This class gathers functionality regarding files and file systems that are not available in java.io.File.
